headline: SDGE Wins Two Chartwell Awards for Excellence in Outage Operations and Communications
summary: San Diego Gas & Electric (SDGE) announced today that it has been honored with two 2025 Chartwell Best Practices Awards: the Gold Award for Excellence in Outage Operations and the Silver Award for Excellence in Outage Communications. The awards recognize SDGE's leadership in safeguarding communities during extreme weather events and advancing innovative technologies to help reduce wildfire risks and power outages.
